# allRecipientAddresses

**Instance Property**

An array of email addresses for all recipients of the message.

## Declaration

```swift
var allRecipientAddresses: [MEEmailAddress] { get }
```

## Discussion

This property contains all values in [doc://com.apple.mailkit/documentation/MailKit/MEMessage/toAddresses], [doc://com.apple.mailkit/documentation/MailKit/MEMessage/ccAddresses], and [doc://com.apple.mailkit/documentation/MailKit/MEMessage/bccAddresses].

The entries in the array specify the email addresses only, and don’t include any additional text. For example, if the recipient headers in the message includes `Maria Ruiz <mruiz2@icloud.com>`, the array contains `mruiz2@icloud.com`.

## Accessing the Sender and Recipients

- **fromAddress**: The sender’s email address.
- **toAddresses**: An array of email addresses for the primary recipients of the message.
- **ccAddresses**: An array of email addresses for the secondary recipients of the message.
- **bccAddresses**: An array of email addresses for the concealed tertiary recipients of the message.
- **replyToAddresses**: An array of email addresses to use when replying to the message.
